background.marine-degree: Marine engineering DESS degree (Telecommunication and robotic)
background.mechanical-degree: Bachelor and Master degree in mechanics
background.professional-training-content: C++, OpenGl, C#/.Net, Parallelism, Agile Methods, WebGL, WPF and multi-threading, React JS

curriculum_vitae.description: Developer of desktop and web softwares since the beginning of my career, I followed languages and frameworks evolutions, and thus gained some experience in terms of software architecture, algorithms and user interfaces
curriculum_vitae.name: Matthieu Shioda

catalog-3d.description: Development of a touchscreen software (desktop and tablet PC) for the general public for 3D virtual fitting for the sale of custom-made suits

cutting-room-desktop.description: Development of cloud applications (Azure) dedicated to data preparation and cutting room organization
cutting-room-desktop.detail_1: Front end architecture design and development (applications, common modules, communication)
cutting-room-desktop.detail_2: Design and development of front/cloud exchange protocols (CRUD, asynchronous, competition, parallel, paging)
cutting-room-desktop.detail_3: Supervision of junior developers (technical support, code reviews)

cutting-room-web.description: Development of web modules for cloud applications (Azure) dedicated to data preparation and cutting room organization
cutting-room-web.detail_1: Front end architecture design and development (applications, common modules, internationalisation)
cutting-room-web.detail_2: Design and development of front/cloud exchange protocols (CRUD management via ReactQuery)
cutting-room-web.detail_4: Implementation of Storybooks, cypress unit tests

designconcept.description: Development of a 3D surface layout software, DesignConcept, plug-in of TopSolid CAD software (Missler Software), analysis of the needs of different markets (automotive, aeronautical, nautical, furniture, composite, inflatable structures, lingerie, ...) through alpha sites and proposal of technical solutions
designconcept.detail_2: Analysis of the needs of the various markets (automotive, aeronautical, nautical, furniture, composite, inflatable structures, lingerie, etc.) through alpha sites and proposal of technical solutions

experience.furniture-cad-study: Studies and costing for the development of a new 2D/3D CAD software dedicated to the furniture market

helioss.description: Developed a finite element pre and post processor (general, business oriented for automotive crash, fluid, biomechanics and stamping) for the HELIOSS environment (RADIOSS solver)
helioss.detail_1: Design and development of an OpenGL graphics library

modaris-2d.description: Development of virtual folds on a 2D/3D CAD software for model making

modaris-3d.description: Developments on a 3D clothing simulation software
modaris-3d.detail_2: COM interfacing for inter software communication

user-workspace.description: Development of a data access portal including visualization modules, database search, workflow management
user-workspace.detail_1: Front end architecture design and development

experience.virtual: Mini virtual reality project on HTC Vive
